unnormalised: Arre, tuka nove census-ache data disle? Bharotachi lokhsankhya atam 1.4286 billion asa mhunn andaz kel'la! Tem khup lok, bhai. Mhaka aikunk ailem ki vikas dar sumar 1.2% protivarshak mand zala, punn torui, tem ek vhodd ankda. Tuka chintunk laita resources vishim, nhoi? Khas korun Mumbai sarkhea shaharamnim, zaka lokhsankhya ghantta 20,000 proticho km asa. Kalpna kor 8:30 AM-ak local train-an boska mellounk sodhtana. Purem dhandgall!
normalised: Arre, tuka novea jangannechi mahiti disli kai? Bharotachi loksankhya atam eka point char don aath so sah billian ashi andaz kel'li asa! Tee khup lok, bhai. Mhaka aikuk aila ki vadhichem dhar sumar eka point don percent dor varshak demem zalam, punn tori astana, tee ek vhoddli sankhya. Tuka vichar aila kitim sadhana visheshi, nai? Vishesh karun Mumbai shara bhaxen, zanchi loksankhya ghanata sumar vis hazar dor chauras kilometer asa. Kalpana kara aath tis A-M vellar sthanik relgadient basak melloun gheunk prayatn kortana. Purn gorbod!
